body:
Howdy y'all.
So lots of you have been asking why Top 5 only had 1 episode and then it stopped.
Easy answer..
Currently, I only have a submission from SevHoe, Zegita, and Xuph.

Lots of y'all have been complaining about how Top 5 isn't getting released and I'm just being 'lazy' and whatnot, but I literally don't have enough submissions to make another episode.
Now.. if you guys want a prize for this, I'll be giving away 3k credits to the #1 spot, so hopefully that'll motivate some of you to send in clips.

But Porky, why are you writing about this now?
Well, due to the recent influx of OCN players, I might pick this series back up and hopefully there will be more submissions.

As for shadowolf365..
Shadow has been hinting for a while now that he wants to take over the series, since I'm probably not doing as good a job as I should.. 
He recently asked me on my YouTube channel if he can take over the series, and I said yeah he can.
Still though, he doesn't need to ask permission since multiple people can do this series.. it's not just limited to 1 person. So I'm assuming he's going to start one up as well, so expect that in the near future (I'm thinking)..

Anyways, if you know anyone who wants to participate in this, please let them know, and I'd highly appreciate that.

NOW I WANT TO ASK YOU THIS...
Do you guys even WANT Top 5 to come back? I know a ton of people loved it and I got great support on the episode that I did, so I'd hate to see it permanently go away.

Let me know if you want me to keep doing these..

CONTACT EMAIL FOR SUBMISSIONS IS avicustopplays@gmail.com

Anyways, that was my lil' rant.
Hit me up with some opinions!
